text: Gianni Falchi Stadium (2011) Fortitudo Baseball 1953, commonly referred to as Fortitudo Bologna, also known as UnipolSai Bologna for sponsorship reasons, is a baseball club based in Bologna that competes in Serie A1, Italy's professional baseball league. The team plays at Gianni Falchi Stadium and has won 13 national championships and 6 European Cups. In 2013, the team was invited to participate in the Asia Series, placing sixth overall after losing to Samsung Lions (5-2) and Uni-President 7-Eleven Lions (10-0). == External links == * Official site Category:Baseball teams in Italy Category:Sport in Bologna
title: Fortitudo Baseball Bologna
